===== Matrix of size 2 =====
Matrix has correct type
[[19.0, 22.0], [43.0, 50.0]]

Matrix has correct type
[[84.0, 90.0, 96.0], [201.0, 216.0, 231.0], [318.0, 342.0, 366.0]]
